citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:15am on
12/27/2025. The inspectors attempted to contact the licensee by honking the horn outside the front gate and calling the
provided contact numbers on two separate occasions and leaving voicemail messages. Failure to provide access to the
facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result
in enforcement action.
Additional Inspectors:
KATHARINE FRANK, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:15am on 
12/27/2025. The inspectors attempted to contact the licensee by honking the horn outside the front gate and calling the 
provided contact numbers on two separate occasions and leaving voicemail messages. Failure to provide access to the 
facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result 
in enforcement action. 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
KATHARINE FRANK, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
